summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2261 for the improvement of North and West Seventy-eighth Street, from Greenwood Avenue to Eighth Avenue Northwest; West Seventy-third Street, from Third Avenue Northwest to Eighth Avenue Northwest; and Sixth Avenue Northwest, from West Sixty-fifth Street to West Eighty-fifth Street, all in The City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, wooden curbs and wooden crosswalks thereon and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 23098 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
